And second, if you need to fill a job vacancy, Zubka helps you find the perfect person - in a simpler, cheaper, more hassle free way than the usual recruitment routes.

name: Prefio
overview:
Prefio is bringing recruitment by rewarded referral to the commercial property / real estate sector.

The founders have a great deal of experience of the European Commercial Real Estate market and wanted to bring a new model of recruitment to the sector - faster access to more of the best candidates and at no additional cost to the employer.

Enabled by web technologies, but retaining a “human element” the business is building a substantial base of referrers initially UK centric but then expanding to continental Europe and beyond. By defining their area of activity (commercial real estate) very tightly, and then sub dividing into the circa 10 main groupings of sub disciplines they are building a highly targetted business.

name: XinXii
overview:
XinXii is Europe’s leading indie eBook publishing and distribution platform

We empower everybody to upload and sell all kind of written word on her/his XinXii author page: short works, documents and books (as eBook or audiobook) - in multiple formats including PDF, ePub and mobi. As an aggregator, XinXii converts eBooks to the ePub- and mobi-format, and distributes eBooks to major international retailers such as Amazon, Casa del Libro, iBookstore and Kobo.

name: Gigantiq
overview: Gigantiq are Australian-based Software Development Specialists. We are expert in the development of Enterprise Systems in Java and Ruby. We are firm believers in pragmatic approaches to software develpment and usually favour agile practices. We intend to develop a full range of products under the Gigantiq badge as well as collaborating to help others with product development.

name: AddsYou
overview:
AddsYou.com is a social publishing network that pays authors for their written works.

This compilation of novels, shorts stories, poems, screenplays, etc. is positioned to become the world’s largest database of knowledge. Characterized as the Ultimate Publishing Platform™, AddsYou redefines the way people publish and share knowledge on the internet, without the limitations of a blog, forum or wiki. Adds You is the evolution of online knowledge-based sharing and publishing. It is unencumbered by the limitations of a blog, forum or wiki. By combining a free and easy-to-use publishing platform with helpful tools, such as personal and shared collections to manage and sort publishings, an importer to transfer blog postings, and a license and copyright manager, AddsYou is the one stop shop for publishing, marketing and monetizing content on the web.

name: Restore Doctors
overview:
The business RestoreDoctors.com started from humble beginnings as Arizona iPod Repair in late 2006, was renamed RestoreDoctors.com in late 2007, and since that time has evolved into one of the top online iPod repair and iPhone repair companies in the country. We relocated operations to San Antonio, to be more centrally-located to customers across the United States, but we receive devices quite literally from over the world.

We fix iPods and iPhones of every generation and model right here in our shop (we do not outsource our repairs like some of of those fly-by-night shops may do), where they are repaired, tested, and shipped right back to your waiting arms.

Your device will be treated well as it moves from receiving to evaluation to repair to testing to shipping, and you will be kept in the loop at every step of the process, a critical piece when you are sending your expensive iPhone or iPod off for a repair. You have our assurances that you will receive only the best we have to offer.

name: iResQ
overview: iResQ is an Apple Authorized Service Provider that repairs iPods, iPhones, iPads, Sony PSPs, and Apple desktop and notebook computers like MacBooks. It offers 24-hr. diagnostics from Apple-certified technicians. It sells individual electronics parts and accessories. The company also buys back used or broken iPods and iPhones. A local recycling facility partners with it to redistribute its surplus electronics to nonprofit organizations. iResQ also has its cardboard and paper waste processed for a 100% green operation.

name: KillerStartups
overview:
KillerStartups.com is a user driven internet startups community. Entrepreneurs, investors, and bloggers are staying informed on up-and-coming internet startups using our blog platform, where internet entrepreneurs submit their startup to see what others think about it. KillerStartups reviews 15+ internet startups per working day.

Their vision: “Tapping the wisdom of crowds to find the next internet big thing.” They deeply believe in the power of crowds, and we want to put it to good use by detecting in an early stage what’s going to be big.

name: Tailgate Technologies
overview:
Tailgate Technologies, headquartered in London, UK, is a technology company that offers advertising solutions for all stakeholders in the online advertising value chain.

Tailgate™ technology turns any online advertising unit into a direct point of sale by providing a clever bridge between the ad unit and the brand owner’s own e-commerce system. The company’s mission is to change the way consumers interact with and buy services and products from advertisers, enabling advertisers to close the gap between marketing and sales. Advertisers can benefit from 15 per cent customer interaction rates with a 1–3 per cent conversion rate, while site owners benefit from higher visitor retention rates as the consumer doesn’t have to leave the site he or she is browsing in order to make a purchase.

Tailgate Technologies is managed by young professionals with a clear vision and understanding of the advertising space. The company was founded by Christopher Autry, its current CEO, a veteran internet industry professional, management consultant and a one time biochemist.

The company has partnered with leading brands such as the major Hollywood Studios, global retailers and third party agencies to promote their respective services and products to potential customers on the Internet.

How it works:

Tailgate treats advertising as a self-contained application. This encompasses the entire electronic commerce value chain into a single unit and appears as a traditional Internet advertising banner, video or widget, but with the capability to perform secure financial transactions using payment gateways.

Tailgate™, a patent pending technology, utilises standard Internet application platforms such as Flash or Ajax to create a presentation layer for the advertising content and proprietary techniques to securely communicate with the advertiser’s electronic commerce database, as well as with the trusted payment gateway in use. The units provide 256-bit SSL security protocols in conjunction with numerous proprietary encryption protocols for each transaction, to guarantee the user’s security and privacy. User information is never stored or held and is deleted in 90 seconds if the information is not processed by the receiving e-commerce provider. The security framework is fully PCI compliant and meets all international security standards. Additionally, California-based Verisign secures the secure socket layer connection from the units to the main e-commerce Web server and payment gateway used.

name: Noesis Interactive
overview:
Noesis Interactive is the premier developer of training materials for game modders and indie-developers, multi-disciplinary artists within fields such as: game design, programming, 3D and 2D art, machinima, UI design and web development. Working with leading game studios and software developers such as Valve Corporation, Avid Technology, Inc., Autodesk, Inc. and IGN, Noesis actively expands the knowledge and creativity of it’s user base preparing them for industry careers or independent production.

Noesis Interactive is dedicated to improving gaming related education worldwide, both within academic institutions and through online educational content distribution. Noesis is based in the California San Francisco Bay Area, just minutes from Silicon Valley.

Future game developers, MOD Your World™ today!

name: WaferTech
overview: WaferTech is a semiconductor manufacturer, specifically a dedicated semiconductor foundry solely committed to producing integrated circuits for its clients. Its fully integrated fab offers manufacturing capabilities to meet the requirements of different IC designs. WaferTech is a subsidiary of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing (TSM), which owns about 97% of the company.

name: Mercado
overview: Mercado provides a commerce-specific search engine for online retailing. The company provides software used to manage e-commerce operations, including merchandising, searching, catalog management, and browsing functions. Mercado provides eCommerce professionals with a platform on which to execute merchandising strategies and drive revenue growth.

name: SolFocus
overview: SolFocus’s mission is to enable solar energy generation at a Levelized Cost of Energy (LCOE) competitive with traditional fossil fuel sources. To achieve this goal, SolFocus has developed leading concentrator photovoltaic (CPV) technology which combines high-efficiency solar cells (approaching 40%) and advanced optics to provide solar energy solutions which are scalable, dependable and capable of delivering on the promise of clean, low-cost, renewable energy.

name: THQ
overview: THQ Inc. is a developer and publisher of interactive entertainment software. The company develops its products for all popular game systems, personal computers and wireless devices. Headquartered in Los Angeles County, California, THQ sells product through its global network of offices located throughout North America, Europe and Asia Pacific.

name: Miracle Labs
overview:
Miracle Labs creates crowd-sourced web services that adapt user-provided knowledge and expertise into reusable information. These services span multiple sectors and solve problems for companies and consumers.

Their first site, bug.gd, is an error message search engine where users are asked later to provide solutions that worked for them. This information is then available to the next person who ran into the problem. Bug.gd has received wide-spread acclaim, including being listed as one of PC World magazine’s 101 Fantastic Freebies list for 2008.

Featurelist.org makes it easy for users to suggest and vote on feature requests. Any project can use it to gather community feature requests and direct feedback from their users through website widgets. Project leaders and the community can track the progress of those features as they are developed.

Two more major value-focused crowd-sourcing services are planned in 2008 and early 2009.

name: Sonosite
overview:
SonoSite, Inc., specialist in hand-carried ultrasound, is an innovator in the rapidly growing, global portable ultrasound market. Through its expertise in ASIC design, SonoSite is able to offer imaging performance typically found in costly ultrasound machines weighing more than 300 pounds in a system that is approximately the size and weight of a laptop computer.

This breakthrough is transforming and expanding the worldwide diagnostic ultrasound market by serving existing clinical markets more efficiently and creating new point-of-care applications where ultrasound was either too cumbersome or too expensive to be used before. With over 40,000 systems sold since 1999, SonoSite® products are known for exceptional performance, ease of use and durability.

name: Mindray Medical International
overview:
Mindray Medical International Limited, through its subsidiary, Shenzhen Mindray Bio-Medical Electronics Co., Ltd., develops, manufactures, and markets medical devices worldwide. It operates in three segments: Patient Monitoring and Life Support Products, In-Vitro Diagnostic Products, and Medical Imaging Systems. The Patient Monitoring and Life Support Products segment offers patient monitoring devices for adult, pediatric, and neonatal patients, and used principally in hospital intensive care units, operating rooms, and emergency rooms. Its patient monitoring devices tracks the physiological parameters of patients, such as heart rate, blood pressure, respiration, and temperature.

The company has operations in North America, Europe, China, and other Asian countries. Mindray Medical International Limited was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People’s Republic of China.

name: Saset Healthcare
overview:
Saset Healthcare is a startup involved in the design and manufacturing of high end ultrasound machines headquartered in Cayman Islands with offices in US, Canada, China, and India

Founding team consists of members from Siemens Medical Devices and founder of Berkeley Networks and NetContinuum

name: Outcast
overview: Outcast is an advertising solution for gas stations (at-the-pump advertising).

name: Ascio Technologies
overview:
Ascio Technologies Holding A/S provides domain registration, management, and transaction services in Denmark and internationally. Its products include ASCIONIC, a registration engine for domain registration and management; AscioDNS, a management tool for DNS hosting, domain registration, and mail/Web forwarding; and Ascio Watch that enables customers to monitor their trademarks and brands online. It also offers information on data and documentation requirements, legal issues, validation rules, processing times, and processing automation. The company’s portfolio of services include WHOIS and domain availability, partner portal, API, and packaged marketing campaign services, as well as bulk transfer models for consolidation of domains. It serves Internet access providers, Web hosting companies, telecom operators, and IP law firms.

The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark with additional offices in New York, London, Vienna, Nice, Madrid, Zurich, Oslo, and Munich. As of January 17, 2007, Ascio Technologies Holding A/S operates as a subsidiary of Group NBT plc.

name: Trunk Archive
overview: Trunk Images A/S operates as an image licensing agency that represents photographers. It offers image research and visual strategy consultation services. The company’s archive provides images in the areas of fashion, celebrity, beauty, lifestyle, still life, design, architecture, and travel. Trunk Images A/S was founded in 2004 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: Happiness Foundation
overview: Happiness Foundation is an alternative to traditional philanthropy, providing pro bono consulting services rather than money to Nonprofits. Through the Foundation, business leaders and experts donate their time, knowledge, and contacts to help Nonprofits increase their impact. Acting as a matchmaker and project coordinator, Happiness Foundation makes this new form of giving possible. Happiness Foundation is a private foundation tax-exempt under section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code.

name: Telstra
overview:
Australia’s leading telecommunications and information services company, with one of the best known brands in the country. We offer a full range of services and compete in all telecommunications markets throughout Australia, providing more than 9.6 million Australian fixed line and 9.4 million mobile services, including 4.4 million 3G services.

One of our major strengths in providing integrated telecommunications services is our vast geographical coverage through both our fixed and mobile network infrastructure. This network and systems infrastructure underpins the carriage and termination of the majority of Australia’s domestic and international voice and data telephony traffic.

name: Voice2Insight
overview:
Voice2insight is a service provided by Prototyping Management Corporation (PMC). Founded in 1994 to assist organizations with their strategic development, Voice2insight is the industry’s only provider of Mobile Dictation Sales Enablement Solutions for Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems. Voice2insight’s Mobile Dictation Solutions and On-Demand Sales Enablement platform maximizes the sales organization’s ability to communicate client, competitive and market information in an easy, clear, consistent and compelling way - simply by talking.

Voice2insight solutions integrate with various CRM platforms combining proven sales and marketing best practices with award-winning Mobile Dictation technology. Voice2insight addresses the primary aspects of the Sales Enablement challenge—maximizing productivity while capturing and recording client, competitive and market insights.

name: LikeUmm
overview:
A directory of the best sites on the web as voted by the community.

LikeUmm is an easy to use internet directory where the best sites on the web rise to the top through community voting. Voting is on a scale of 1-10 and anyone can submit their site to the directory.

name: OffsetX
overview:
OffsetX is a network of social action and entertainment websites that enables participants to “offset” the actions and support provided by enthusiasts of opposing interests and opinions through actions of their own. The OffsetXTM leverages the polar rivalries that currently exist — and are strengthening — in American society, and provides an engaging forum to express those opinions, take action to counteract offsetting views, create their own OffsetX communities and otherwise effect change.

“Why stop at carbon offsets? Offset anything!” This statement forms the premise that is driving the creation and launch of OffsetX. The central hub of OffsetX — OffsetX.com — is the one-stop-shop home for anyone looking to take action by offsetting virtually anything, anywhere, at any time.

name: Netcontinuum
overview:
NetContinuum, Inc. provides application controllers to deploy, secure, and manage enterprise Web applications. Its products include Web application firewalls that enable data center teams to secure existing enterprise applications; and Web application gateways, which provide application security, load balancing, content switching, connection pooling, caching, and GZIP compression to enable deployment of new enterprise applications. The company’s controllers are used for managing business risk, DMZ consolidation, application deployment, instant PCI compliance, failed audit recovery, lowering DMZ TCO, and securing FTP. It also offers on-site installation, training, support, and other on-site custom engagements. NetContinuum serves the financial services, government, e-business, media and communications, ASP/software, healthcare, and education sectors.

The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Santa Clara, California. As of July 2007, NetContinuum, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Barracuda Networks, Inc.

name: Berkeley Networks
overview: Berkeley Networks was a leading startup company that built intelligent switches targeted for the high end of the small and medium-sized business computer networking market segment. The Company was established in 1996. The name of the company comes from the school; University of California Berkeley. The founder and CEO, Ravi Sethi, received his Ph.D. and MBA from the University of California, Berkeley. Berkeley Networks was acquired by Pittsburgh based FORE Systems for US $250 Million, and then which later was acquired by London based GEC (now Marconi Corporation plc) for £2.8 Billion.

name: AMF Ventures
overview:
AMF Ventures was founded in 2002 by Tony Fish. AMF Ventures work on a variety of intellectually challenging assignments conducted in a spirit of team co-operation where the focus is always on delivering business advantage to the client.

AMF Ventures culture is characterised by debate in an open, friendly, supportive, fast-paced working environment with flexible working arrangements.

name: dotnet solutions
overview: DotNet Solutions is an information technology (IT) company working with small and medium sized businesses. They specialize in Microsoft products. This specialization is backed by the extensive experience of a professionally qualified/industry certified Principal Consultant. They are a Microsoft Partner demonstrating that they understand - and can deal with - the IT requirements of small businesses.

name: SnappyFingers
overview: SnappyFingers is a Question and Answer search engine. It crawls and indexes FAQs spread across the Internet, and provides search results in a easy to view Question/Answer format. While most visitors use the site for finding answers, few have also found it to be valuable in conducting research.

name: SpinningYourWeb International
overview:
SpinningYourWeb International is a Southern African based web development company which specializes in the development of online applications for small to medium sized businesses.

SpinningYourWeb is lead by Noel and Andre’ Harrison and was founded in late 2004 with the goal to provide small to medium sized business access to the world market.

SpinningYourWeb has a growing international presence. The first international branch was launched in Australia in the December of 2007.

name: BrushVideo
overview:
BrushVideo offers a free service where people can upload their videos and edit them online.

Our online video editor, which is running inside the browser, allows people to mix videos, change the audio, add webcam videos, effects and animations.

The changes they make to their videos can be previewed live. After generating the movie, users can upload it automatically to YouTube or use it on their pages.

name: Disruptive Media
overview:
Disruptive Media Ltd. is a company developing (mobile) web services.

Disruptive Media Ltd. released its first web app, PiX ‘n’ PaLs (www.pixnpals.com), in September 2007. PiX ‘n’ PaLs lets users build up their life story as a joint venture with friends and colleagues. Users can create events and invite people to them, so that everyone can upload their photos to the same place. This solves the issue that photos taken by different people at an event often get posted, emailed or stored in completely different places.

name: SimpleCDN
overview:
Founded in 2007, SimpleCDN provides advanced content delivery services which shatter existing price barriers.

With pricing that starts less than single source delivery providers such as Amazon S3, SimpleCDN offers HTTP, HTTPS, RTMP, RTSP & MMS access to objects, supporting not only downloads, but also Flash & Windows Media Streaming. In addition, SimpleCDN is one of the only CDNs which supports on-the-fly gzip compression, and the ability to control cache-control and expires headers.

In September of 2008, SimpleCDN released its live streaming service, with the ability to stream both live Flash & Windows Media to worldwide audiences.

SimpleCDN was designed to handle high-bandwidth applications such as HD video delivery, with its 100% solid state and 10Gbe architecture.

name: Hoccam
overview: Hoccam is a Turkish social networking site. It is currently only available for Middle East Technical University students.

name: Chapter Communications
overview:
Chapter Communications has provided interactive website and communication services to community groups and organizations since 2004.

The websites allow organizations to easily edit their sites, send emails to their members, plan events, create sign-up lists and message boards, post jobs/internships, add photo galleries, pay bills online, upload files and view statistics of their website.

Chapter Communications has created more than 1,000 websites for university Greek chapters and various other community groups and organizations across the country.

name: Vinfolio
overview:
Based in San Francisco, with a second location opening in Hong Kong in Fall 2008, Vinfolio’s guiding principle is “Fine wine, finer service,” demonstrating the company’s unparalleled level of personalized customer service and collector services. Vinfolio’s wine store is seamlessly integrated with collector services, all designed to make the wine buying, selling and collecting experience effortless and enjoyable. From an extensive selection of fine wine to VinCellar™, its online cellar management software, to collector services (including on-site inventorying and full-service storage), Vinfolio delivers “Fine wine, finer service”.

Vinfolio was founded by Stephen J. Bachmann, who incorporated his expertise in technology and finance with his passion for wine. Having amassed a 7,000 bottle collection, Bachmann realized all too well the challenges of building and managing a wine collection. He launched Vinfolio in 2003 as an integrated solution for serious wine lovers and currently serves as the company’s CEO. As he explains it, “finally the administrative tasks associated with amassing and developing a wine collection can be accomplished with efficiency, expertise and convenience, allowing passionate oenophiles to get back to the fun of collecting and drinking wine.”

In addition to its expert staff of oenophiles, Vinfolio has a notable group of advisors with deep expertise in all aspects of the wine industry. These include members of the board of directors and personal investors Jean-Michel Valette, M.W., Former Chairman of Robert Mondavi Winery, Colin Lind, Managing Partner of Blum Capital Partners, L.P and Bill Timken, founding partner of Hambrecht & Quist. In addition, Vinfolio’s board of advisors includes Rajat Parr, wine director for the MICHAEL MINA group; Martine Saunier, founder of Martine’s Wines; Vineyard 29 owner Chuck McMinn; and entrepreneur and collector William J. Shea.

name: DriveCMS
overview: DriveCMS is a SaaS, Enterprise-level Content Management System that is completely customized depending on client needs. The system has built in support for: Ad Management, Ecommerce Functionality, Page Management, Intranet Options, Blog Management, Photo Gallery, Article and News Builder, Detailed Website Stats, and more. All aspects of the system have been built with real world SEO in mind.

name: Marcellus
overview:
Marcellus is a cloud-based platform for small to medium sized business to publish high quality video on the web, inexpensively.

Built on top of Amazon Web Services cloud services, the Marcellus Video Platform helps you go live with your content in a matter of minutes.

Learn more about us on our site(http://marcellus.tv/services), or just drop us a note(buzz AT marcellus DOT tv).

name: Entellium
overview: Entellium provides customer relationship management (CRM) software for businesses.

name: Bidaroo
overview:
Bidaroo is a charity auction that sells Products for at least 90% below retail. For example, if a product costs $1,000 then one could purchase the item on Bidaroo.com for $100 or less. The winner of an auction is found by taking the highest UNIQUE (not the same as anyone else’s) bid. The following is an example of the highest ten bids in a HIGHEST Unique Bid auction, with a maximum Bidaroo Price is set to $100: $100.00 $100.00 $99.99 $99.99 $99.99

$99.98 <– WINNER & HIGHEST UNIQUE BID

$99.97 $99.96 $99.96 $99.96

The bidder who placed the bid of $99.98 would be the highest unique bid and therefore the winner of the Bidaroo auction. The winner then purchases the product for $99.98. Bidaroo uses Blindfolded auctions so no one can see what others have bid. However, Bidaroo now allows customers to see who the current unique bidder is!

name: Yamli
overview: Yamli.com let’s user easily type and search in Arabic through it’s Smart Arabic Keyboard, and Arabic Search technology . The Smart Arabic Keyboard allows users to type Arabic without an Arabic keyboard from within their web browser. This technology is based on a real-time transliteration engine which converts words typed with Latin characters to their closest Arabic equivalent. Yamli Arabic Search is a search engine focused on providing more relevant search results for an Arabic query by expanding it to its most frequently used Latin representations.

name: Creative Kingdom Animation Studios Film
overview:
The Creative Kingdom Animation Studios Film is a sub-division of Creative Kingdoms Inc, a multinational organization with facilities in UAE, USA, Philippines, Thailand and China.

The CKA Thailand studio is located in the beautiful northern Thai city of Chiang Mai, occupying the top floor of the prestigious Kad Suan Kaew Plaza complex. At present, CKA Thailand, which was established in 2005, has expanded to encompass 200 animation, film and architectural illustration specialists. The offices house not only animation and film departments but the marketing division, project development teams, a 30-seat-theatre with two 35mm film projectors, a green-screen room, production facilities that can handle chroma-key shoots, advertising and titling stings, as well as other one-off projects, the sound recording room, the architectural model shop, and most recently an animation museum that exhibit 4 original animations produced by CKA and a bookazine for children; ToonBoon Bookazine.

In a very short period, CKA Thailand has become the leading independent producer, providing the largest and most modern facility in Thailand.

The Creative Kingdom Animation Studios Filmhas an international reach in different areas ranging from broadcast and television companies to architectural and multinational construction projects. The Creative Kingdom Animation Studios Film has also developed additional expertise in international event organization, merchandising and licensing, especially in the area of television programming.

name: Sceneclips
overview: Sceneclips is an online platform that connects filmmakers with film investors. Sceneclips film investors network makes it easier for filmmakers to find financing and distribution by connecting them with studios, production companies, and high-net-worth individuals.

name: Expand Online
overview:
Expand Online is a full-service online marketing company that offers value-for-money products for small- and medium-sized companies in the Benelux.

The product portfolio includes:

  • AdWords Beginner/Professional: generate more traffic to your website and measure conversion to revenues
  • eWerving (eRecruitment): use search engine advertising to fill your vacancies quickly and cost effective

Expand Online has developed bid management and reporting software to manage and optimize search engine marketing campaigns.

name: Lokalisten
overview: Lokalisten is a social network originally started by 5 friends from munich. compared to facebook or studivz it has strong local ties with “homebases” in cities and villages in germany, austria, turkey, ….

name: VIrtualVu
overview: VirtualVU produces virtual events that deliver all the benefits of a high impact event without the challenges and costs of getting people together physically. Within the VirtualVu platform, business associates can meet, exchange ideas and attend interactive presentations, all from the comfort of the office or home computer. VirtualVu offers an innovative approach for marketing conferences, product launches, trade shows, and job fairs.

name: iRISQ
overview:
iRISQ was founded in 2007 with the mission of helping landlords and property managers to “Rent Safer” and “Rent Smarter”™ by mitigating the serious risks, liabilities, and financial consequences that they face when trying to make informed decisions about rental housing applications.

Landlords and property managers told us that credit reports and reference checks were important tools for evaluating applicants; however, each application could involve several time-consuming reference checks and there were few tools beyond a landlord’s intuition to help assess the reliability of the references being provided. They also told us how credit reports left many important questions unanswered and how recent shifts in the housing market have made evaluating applicants based upon credit reports alone even more difficult.

name: Media by Numbers
overview: Media by Numbers is a box office data and analysis resource founded by Paul Dergarabedian.

name: DigitalDeejay
overview: DigialDeejay is the parent company of MIX.dj, the world’s largest web and mobile based DJ community. The MIX.dj web and mobile music community consists of content producers, content consumers and advertisers. MIX.dj has 1.5 million mobile users (iOS and Droid) and over 120,000 registered users on the web. The content is primarily user-generated DJ party mixes and podcasts from DJs around the world. MIX.dj boasts the world’s largest library of DJ party mixes which consists of over 55,000 DJ mixes from 120,000 DJs in 150 countries. New mixes are added 24/7/365. MIX.dj offers a free streaming radio service (with banner and audio ads) and a premium monthly subscription service (ad-free, on-demand access). MIX.dj also develops customized mobile applications for artists (Louie Vega - Todd Terry - Laurent Wolf…), record labels and brands ( Om Records - Definitive Records..). MIX.dj has over 100 different mobile Apps in the Apple Appstore and Droid Market. The MIX.dj advertising platform continues to expand. The MIX.dj global network also includes a powerful web and mobile in-app “House Ad” platform that offers an unique advertising network consisting of over 1.5 million mobile users and 120,000 web users around the world.

name: SWCMS
overview: SWCMS is an open source development team focused on creating a social news platform with similar functionality to the market leaders such as Digg, Reddit, and Propeller. SWCMS offers a mature core product with significant extensibility built on a PHP/MySQL base.

name: Britely
overview: The fastest way to capture the best ideas you read, and keep them where you can see them.

name: Clivir
overview:
Clivir is a free tutorial based learning community where you can be both the teacher and the student.

Clivir features tutorial style lessons that can be created by combining text with web based resources from sites like YouTube, photobucket, flickr and scribd etc.

These lessons are grouped within member created classrooms that provide informal learning environments for discussions and member interactions.

name: Capstone Labs
overview:
Capstone Labs offers website design, web services, web development, custom programming, and IT consulting services.

Our team and experience has enabled us to design, develop and deploy successful custom web design, web services and custom applications for Fortune Top 100 companies, government organizations, a vast array of small businesses and civic organizations. This experience combined with our highly trained staff, proven web development and custom programming techniques allows Capstone Labs to develop and deploy successful web development and web services that are robust enough to handle even the largest of clients needs.

name: InterStilist Professionnel
overview: Das Mode Portal Modenews, Forum, Shop und Portal for Modes

name: Guardium
overview:
Guardium, the database security company, delivers the most widely-used solution for preventing information leaks from the data center and ensuring the integrity of enterprise data.

The company’s enterprise security platform is now installed in more than 450 data centers worldwide, including 5 of the top 5 banks; 3 of the top 5 insurers; top government agencies; 2 of the top 3 retailers; 15 of the world’s top telcos; 2 of the world’s favorite beverage brands; the most recognized name in PCs; a top 3 auto maker; a top 3 aerospace company; and a leading supplier of business intelligence software.

Guardium has partnerships with Accenture, ArcSight, BMC, EMC/RSA, IBM, McAfee, Microsoft, Oracle, Sybase and Teradata, with Cisco as a strategic investor, and is a member of IBM’s prestigious Data Governance Council and the PCI Security Standards Council.

Founded in 2002, Guardium was the first company to address the core data security gap by delivering a scalable, cross-DBMS enterprise platform that both protects databases in real-time and automates the entire compliance auditing process.

name: Sentrigo
overview:
Sentrigo is a database security company, providing host-based software solutions that protect enterprise databases by monitoring all activity in the database in real-time, providing alerts, audit trail and automatic intrusion prevention capabilities.

Sentrigo’s solution, called Hedgehog, is a patent-pending agent technology that uses a very small footprint non-intrusive agent that has complete visibility into all database activity, whether it is originated by outsiders or privileged insiders, and does so without impacting database performance.

Sentrigo Ltd. was formerly known as Monolith Security and changed its name to Sentrigo Ltd. in 2007. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Kfar Saba, Israel.

name: GrabaDiscount
overview: GrabaDiscount.com.au is a free online discount voucher directory. Members can easily access discounts for local businesses throughout Australia.

name: YourMagicPhoto
overview: Make a cool photo montage in less than 10 seconds!

name: TripShake
overview: TripShake is a new service for travelers, where the users can ask questions and receive useful information to help them plan their trips. The website is backed by a community of users ready to help each other answering questions and sharing tips and information always updated and fresh. Using TripShake, travelers can obtain complete and reliable answers thanks to the implementation of semantic technologies, or ask the community for help and obtain answers from other expert travelers or people living all around the world. TripShake becomes a personal travel agent, taking the traveler all the way from her wish to travel, to choosing and buying the most suitable travel option.

name: ExactTarget
overview: ExactTarget, Inc. is a provider of on-demand email marketing software solutions. Their suite of on-demand one-to-one marketing applications enables clients to send business-critical and event-triggered communications to increase sales, optimize marketing investments, and strengthen customer relationships. They offer four editions of their on-demand software application along with integrated solutions such as ExactTarget for AppExchange and ExactTarget for Microsoft Dynamics CRM.

name: Vontoo
overview:
Vontoo brings the emotion, enthusiasm and energy of the human voice to one-to-one marketing communication. Vontoo enables organizations to create, send and track voice messages tailored to the recipient’s interests. Vontoo is accessible over an Internet web browser, anytime or anywhere, and can instantly send from one to millions of automated calls to help clients drive revenues, reduce costs, collect cash faster and enhance customer relationships.

Vontoo is funded from multiple sources, including private investors and venture capital firm, EDF Ventures. Vontoo is privately owned and headquartered in Indianapolis.

name: iGoDigital
overview: iGoDigital provides a suite of web-based commerce tools designed to increase the value of every customer interaction by emulating and, in many cases, improving the in-store shopping experience. The companies SaaS platform provides a comprehensive, fully-integrated, and highly extensible product recommendation and social commerce solution that drives online retail.

name: Healthx
overview:
Healthx, Inc., a technology company, provides healthcare data and communications technology solutions. The company focuses on multi-channel healthcare solutions encompassing Web and phone to address the needs of members, providers, brokers, and human resources professionals. It offers OpenX Web, a technology platform that enables payers to design, sell, and deliver health plans; OpenX Phone that automates the handling of eligibility, accumulator status, claim status, and benefit queries from members and service providers; and Disease Management and Predictive Modeling for predictive modeling, comprehensive chronic disease management, and provider profiling and intervention services. The company also provides Provider Services Portal, a Web-based, HIPAA compliant portal that offers healthcare providers with online access to patient information; and Enrollment and Eligibility, a product for improving enrollment and eligibility efficiencies. In addition, it enables online purchasing of durable medical equipment and over the counter items. Further, the company provides technology, implementation, consulting, account management, and ongoing support; financial account services; and Automated Voice Solutions, which enables payers and employers to manage member communications.

Healthx, Inc. was formerly known as Healthx.com, Inc. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Indianapolis, Indiana.

name: Hologic
overview: Hologic, Inc. engages in the development, manufacture, and supply of medical imaging systems and diagnostic and surgical products focused on the healthcare needs of women. Products The company operates in four segments: Breast Health; Diagnostics; GYN Surgical; and Skeletal Health. BREAST HEALTH PRODUCTS The company’s breast health business offers a line of breast imaging products, including the Selenia full field digital mammography system, a series of screen-film mammography systems, breast biopsy image guidance systems, computer-aided detection (CAD) systems for both screen-film and digital mammography, and DirectRay digital detectors. Its breast health business also includes its Interventional Breast Solutions family of products including breast biopsy devices, its MammoSite radiation therapy system and the MammoPad breast cushion. The company’s photoconductor coating business, which it acquired in connection with its acquisition of its selenium coating capabilities for its digital detectors, is also a component of its breast health business. DirectRay Digital Detector: The company’s DirectRay flat panel detector technology employs an amorphous selenium (a-Se) photoconductor to directly convert x-ray photons into an electrical signal. Selenia Full Field Digital Mammography System: The Selenia full field digital mammography system is based on its proprietary, amorphous selenium DirectRay digital detector, which preserves image quality by using amorphous selenium to directly convert x-rays to electronic signals, without first converting them to light. This direct conversion process preserves image sharpness by eliminating light diffusion.

name: CareerScribe
overview:
CareerScribe is a personal, life-long career support system that allows users to develop, organize, market, brand and manage their careers in a way that is uniquely for, and about, them. With CareerScribe, users can take control of their future by creating a profile and sharing it with companies.

For companies, CareerScribe empowers them to filter through hundreds of applicants, from many different gateways, and quickly get to the best matches for a position they may be looking to fill. Companies can also manage their current employees to identifiy high-growth talent.

name: Mybandstock
overview:
This team is creating a frequent flyer miles system for brands, starting with the entertainment industry.

MyBandStock is a platform that tracks, groups, and rewards fans for online purchasing and promoting behaviors. The company enables entertainment companies to turn passive fans into loyal purchasers by incentivizing users at time-sensitive opportunities of engagement. See an early product iteration at www.mybandstock.com/picturemebroken

name: Adblade
overview: Adblade is the largest content style ad platform on the Web reaching over 300 million users a month. Adblade recently acquired IndustryBrains and now distributes content style and Native advertising ad units to over 1000 premium distribution partners. Over 15,000 advertisers now rely on this premium only distribution network. Adblade is rated the most Brand Safe Ad Platform in the US by Integral Ad Science (formerly Adsafe Media). For more information visit www.adblade.com

name: Karmerd
overview: Karmerd, located in Silicon Valley, is a basically a twitter+digg. In a way it is also similar to Outbrain. You can vote up or down on anything at all. The value of the service will be similar to Google Trends. Much is planned for the service. There is no business plan and there is no plan to monetize it in any way or ask for vc money or even sell it. It’s just for fun. We figure we’ll be able to do a lot with just two servers working in our spare time, even if the site were ever to get immensely popular.

name: Legent Corporation
overview: As of August 1, 1995, Legent Corporation was acquired by CA, Inc. Legent Corporation develops and markets software for the management of information systems. The company’s products are used to manage mainframe, midrange, server, workstation, and PC systems deployed throughout a business enterprise. It is based in Herndon, Virginia.

name: my6sense
overview: my6sense introduces a unique marriage of personalised content discovery and innovative rich media brand advertising for mobile publishers.

name: Kiwibox
overview:
Kiwibox is a social community network based in NYC. Kiwibox.com Inc. trades over-the-counter on the bulletin board under the symbol KIWB.OB. Kiwibox.com Inc. owns and operates Kiwibox.com, a leading destination site that has over over 10 years experience as social network and accordingly loyalty users.

Unlike traditional social networking sites such as MySpace and Facebook, Kiwibox has combined “magazine” content and social networking technolgy in a site that is extremely sticky and attractive to everyone. Kiwibox provides advertisers with a superior, worry-free advertising platform with Profile targeted technology. Kiwibox has made great strides recently, with the release of its 2.0 website and a mobile site geared specifically for mobile devices for full mobile kiwibox experience; this progress has resulted in a dramatic acceleration in new user adoption that bodes very well for the future. We expect Kiwibox to continue its successes with strong user growth and rapidly increasing revenues in 2010 and beyond.

name: Lead Technologies
overview:
Lead Technologies, Inc. provides imaging developer toolkits for software developers and programmers. It offers LEADTOOLS Raster Imaging products for file format import/export, image compression, image display and effects, color conversion, image processing, TWAIN scanning, imaging common dialogs, database integration, printing, and Internet; and LEADTOOLS Document Imaging product line that builds from LEADTOOLS Raster Imaging technology to add features for black and white imaging. The company also provides LEADTOOLS Medical Imaging products to create a DICOM viewer/client server system; LEADTOOLS Vector Imaging Pro toolkit to create 2-D and 3-D viewers, editors, and converters, which support vector and raster image formats; and LEADTOOLS Multimedia SDK that adds multimedia functionality, such as capture, play, convert, and edit, as well as the filters and multimedia file support.

The company was founded as Compression Technology, Inc. in 1990 and changed its name to Lead Technologies, Inc. March, 1991. The company is based in Charlotte, North Carolina.

name: Lizardtech
overview:
LizardTech, Inc. provides software solutions for managing and distributing digital content. The company focuses on managing, distributing, and accessing digital content, such as aerial photographs, satellite imagery, and color scanned documents. It offers GeoExpress Express Suite, which enables users to manage, access, and distribute geospatial imagery, such as aerial photos and satellite images; Express Server that enables users to distribute geospatial image datasets and complete repositories of scanned and electronic documents through the Internet; and Spatial Express, which enables users to store images. The company offers its solutions for the geospatial industry.

LizardTech, Inc. was formerly known as Paradigm Concepts, Inc. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Seattle, Washington with additional offices in Portland; London, the United Kingdom; and Tokyo, Japan. As of August 18, 2003, LizardTech, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Celartem, Inc.

name: Xceed
overview:
Xceed is a global provider of quality, multi-lingual Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) services. We offer integrated customer care, technical support and associated back-office processing to commercial and governmental clients worldwide.

Xceed was established in 2001 to serve as the IT arm of Telecom Egypt with a client base of more than 11 million subscribers. Since then, Xceed has developed into a global provider of BPO services, with multi-sites at multiple locations. Xceed serves to be one of the largest contact centers in the Southern Mediterranean Region.

Xceed currently has four (4) sites within Cairo: two of which are operating full time while the other two function as back up sites to ensure business continuity. Xceed’s main site is located in Cairo’s technology park, The Smart Village.

Xceed has an additional contact center, geographically and culturally proximate to Europe, at Morocco’s technology park, “CasaNearshore Park.” This site boasts a large, qualified Francophone talent pool.

Xceed also has representing offices in the US, Canada, the UK and Dubai.

name: Infima Technologies
overview:
Infima Technologies is a promising dynamic start-up company which developed the NCM, a world leading compression technology with significant advantage over existing technologies. Since its inception, the company has already gained recognition as a technology leader and initiated deals with world leaders as Yahoo, TIS, Kodak, NEC, NDS, PTC and more.

Infima NCM’s significant advantages making it the cutting edge of compression technologies:

  1. Highest Compression ratio!
  2. Highest Acceleration in Data retrieval!
  3. Best advantage in Lossless Compression. Bit-to-Bit retrieval.
  4. No dependency on Data type. Bit level compression, able to compress wide array of data including “Hard to Crack” formats as JPEG, MP3, MPEG4 and PDF.
  5. Able to re-compress already compressed material! (Since it is working on a new and different approach, not like most other compression technologies on the market)
  6. Able to compress to standard formats like JPEG, etc. in much higher speed than alternatives! (Although best performance is achieved with Infima’s format).

Infima’s revolutionary compression technology is based on a Neural Network based patented algorithm, developed by leading experts in applied mathematics and can be seamlessly integrated into existing applications and appliances (literally any application as: Medical Imaging, Document imaging, Video, Storage, Network optimization and more) to achieve excellent compression ratios and acceleration of up to 3 times better than currently used technologies.

name: Siondo
overview:
Siondo is a London-based software service vendor that supplies owner managers and directors of small and medium-sized businesses (SMB) with a set of integrated software applications that enable simple and efficient management of all key business functions.

Siondo software is distributed through a secure monthly subscription model via the Internet. All users need to run Siondo is a PC or MAC with a Web browser and an Internet connection. Our software works best with Microsoft Internet Explorer, Safari, or Mozilla Firefox. Just open your browser, login and go - anytime and from anywhere.

name: Webmoblink
overview:
Webmoblink has launched a first-to-market automated service for advertisers, publishers, and ad agencies, to retain maximum real time control of the entire advertising decision-making process, optimizing both efficiencies and revenue potential. Highly versatile, Webmoblink allows the effective management of advanced, targeted worldwide campaigns across all major digital media, and provides optimized conversion tracking tools and highly detailed statistics for mobile and web, far beyond clicks and impressions.

The company’s innovative platform centralizes the management of a publisher’s web and mobile sites while getting the most favorable ad revenue split. It enables advertisers to fully control ad placement, access highly personalized targeting methods. Real-time, detailed reporting and analysis allows deep filtering, saving time and driving the highest quality traffic to sites, ultimately increasing revenues and brand awareness.

As a cutting-edge technology development company, Webmoblink is currently planning and developing additional innovative web and mobile advertising solutions, which will be added to this platform, and announced in the months to come.

name: The Hyperfactory
overview:
The Hyperfactory powers businesses and brands through the mobile medium.

As the most awarded and oldest independent specialist, they are consistently setting new standards of excellence through their two divisions:

Agency: Powering brands through integrated mobile strategy, creative, media and execution.

Technology: Powering businesses through planning, integration and deployment of mobile technology, regardless of the platform, protocol or device.

With a history of winning more industry accolades and recognition than any agency worldwide, clients include Coca-Cola, BlackBerry, L’Oreal, Vodafone, Disney and Kraft. Privately owned and founded in 2001 by New Zealand brothers Geoffrey and Derek Handley it employs over 100 of the world’s best mobile technology and marketing experts. The Hyperfactory support and deliver globally through their network of offices in Auckland, Los Angeles, New York, Chicago, Hong Kong, Sydney and Hyderabad, India.

name: ConveyThis
overview: ConveyThis is a small, free button which offers website translation on the fly. A tiny snippet of code is generated and can be dropped anywhere into a website’s layout, allowing visitors who speak a foreign language to select their language and translator of choice (Google, Babel-Fish, etc.) without ever having to leave the website they need translated. Additionally, webmasters have access to language statistics of their translators, and can see which languages their site is most frequently translated into.

name: KQED
overview:
KQED, Inc., also known as KQED Public Broadcasting, operates as a public broadcasting company in California. It offers public television, digital television, and public radio services; and delivers television, radio, and Internet content. The company also produces and acquires programs broadcasting from PBS and other distributors; and produces, co-produces, and presents a range of television programs locally, regionally, and nationally, as well as produces own programs and collaborates with filmmakers and documentary producers. Its public radio offers various news, public affairs, and cultural affairs programming. The company serves the people of California with noncommercial media.

KQED, Inc. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California.

name: Fabian Rossano Studio
overview: A full service Photo & Design Studio producing catalogues, ads and web site design. Located NYC, established 1997.

name: Viximo
overview: Viximo empowers Social Networks and Game Developers to capitalize on the massive social application and gaming opportunity. Viximo enables a massive distribution opportunity beyond Facebook for Game Developers by providing a write once, deploy everywhere platform, premium placement and promotion, and distribution optimization. Viximo provides Social Networks a social application and gaming platform complete with a robust virtual currency system and instant access to the highest quality and most successful social applications and games.

name: Epernicus
overview:
Epernicus is a professional networking platform for scientists. Thousands of researchers around the world are using Epernicus to connect with colleagues in their real world scientific networks and to find the expertise and people they need to advance their work.

What makes Epernicus different?

  • Our rich profiles capture the key attributes of a scientist such as their training, publications, and scientific genealogy (mentorship history).
  • We automatically assemble a scientist’s real world network including their research groups, departments, institutions, and alumni networks.
  • We enable researchers to define their “assets” - the topics, materials, and methods in which they have expertise - thereby making it easier to find scientists with specific skills.
  • We help to connect scientists not only from academia but also from private industry and government research institutions. For more details, see: http://epernicus.wordpress.com/2008/06/23/why-should-you-join-epernicus-if-youre-on-linkedin/

Who started Epernicus?

  • Vivek Murthy, MD, MBA (co-founder and chairman) - In addition to serving as chairman of Epernicus, Vivek works part-time as an attending physician at Brigham and Women’s Hospital and as an instructor at Harvard Medical School. During his medical training, he conducted research in microbiology with Gerald Pier (Harvard), and later engaged in health services and public health research initiatives with Cary Gross and David Katz (Yale).
  • Mikhail Shapiro, Ph.D. (co-founder and director) - During his undergraduate years at Brown University, Mikhail co-founded Cyberkinetics Neurotechnology Systems, Inc, a publicly traded neuroscience-focused medical technology company. He later completed his PhD at MIT under the supervision of Robert Langer, PhD where he developed molecular sensors for non-invasive imaging of the brain.
  • Eric Silberstein (co-founder and CEO) - Prior to Epernicus, Eric was founder and Chairman of Idiom Technologies (acquired by SDL).
  • Ezra Freedman (co-founder and CTO) - Prior to Epernicus, Ezra was VP, Technology for Schematic, a leading Los Angeles-based interactive agency that develops interface and technology solutions for the Web, television and mobile devices.

name: Consupo
overview: Consupo.com is a way for consumers to interact with one another and provide honest and personal feedback about their experiences with businesses spanning all industries. Members create cases about their experiences - either positive or negative - for the public to see, comment on, discuss, and share with allies.

name: XMind
overview: XMIND Ltd., a Hong Kong company, is provider of software solutions that enable individuals and teams to collaborate and brainstorm efficiently. XMind designs and delivers technology tools that help businesses outline and expand outcomes of brainstorming sessions, meetings, and presentations.

name: C-KDeals Technology
overview: C-KDeals Technology Puts together and builds custom server solutions for various companies through out the San Francisco Bay area. They also service a few companies across the United States. They are a computer components distributor that carry most anything.

name: DubMeNow
overview:
DubMeNow (Dub) is a mobile software solution for exchanging business cards and instantaneously managing contact information. Dub provides smart phone and PDA users with a way to exchange business contact information using their existing devices.

Additionally, Dub allows users to invite contacts to connect via social networking sites, ‘tag’ or note information about the contact and see when and where meetings took place.

name: Xtreme Widgets
overview:
Xtreme Widgets, a division of The Visionaire Group, Inc., is a full-service Emerging Media agency that concentrates on engaging consumers in the social and mobile settings.

The company integrates the expertise from its fellow teams at The Visionaire Group which include Web Development and Online Display Advertising.

name: FamilyDen
overview:
Familyden is a family social networking website.

Members create a profile and link up to relatives. The site is private, so users can safely share videos and photos with family. Other features include update feed, blogs, news, messages, files and a calender.

name: TVGla
overview: TVGla is a digital marketing agency hell-bent on changing the landscape of our industry by setting trends, not following them. Our strategy is to engage your audience with the right message, in the right medium, at the right moment. From the desktop to the handheld, if it’s digital, we own it.

name: Bleacher Advisor
overview:
Bleacher Advisor is a sports venue review site and structured wiki. Users can add reviews of how great or bad venues were at different services. Users can also add photos they took at games or they can write a venue article.

Since Bleacher Advisor was founded in October of 2008 the site is still in construction and they are planning on launching the site around November 10th.

Bleacher Advisor is very similar to a Crunch Base or Comic Vine.

name: Siri
overview:
Siri is now a product of Apple Corp.

Siri is a virtual personal assistant incorporated as a feature of Apple iPhones beginning with the 4S generation.

Siri was originally developed by SRI International. SRI spun off Siri, Inc., in 2007, and this company launched a personal assistant app in February 2010. Siri, Inc., was acquired by Apple in 2010, and in October 2011 Apple announced that the iPhone 4S would be using this technology.

name: Redon Ads
overview:
Redon Ads specialises in organic optimization of websites for better search engine rankings.

Redon Ads offers a variety of Internet Marketing services like, PPC, Banner Ads, Affiliate Advertising, email Marketing etc. for quick results in order to fulfill your current marketing targets.

name: Cision
overview: Cision AB is a business and communication intelligence firm that provides media research, distribution, monitoring and communication evaluation, as well as target group identification and distribution of information for PR and IR purposes to public relations agencies, corporations, government agencies, universities and non-profit organizations throughout the world. Cision AB has annual revenue of SEK 1.8 billion, and has around 2,500 employees in Canada, China, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Hong Kong, the Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Singapore, Sweden, Lithuania, United Kingdom and the United States.

name: BuzzGain
overview:
BuzzGain empowers individuals and companies to “Do It Yourself PR”.

BuzzGain helps listen, learn, analyze and engage with digital influencers on outreach efforts in an actionable fashion. The fee based service provided, reduces costs of PR by at least 80%.

Proprietary media databases have long existed to help PR professionals understand their targets by building lists and sending press releases. BuzzGain offers an actionable application, that facilitates engagement with mainstream & social media professionals without spamming them.

Cataloging and indexing technology is supplemented with an experienced editorial staff. They research, discover, index and catalog over 100 Million blogs, 250,000 video bloggers, 3.5 micro bloggers, 30,000 media properties including dailies, magazines, periodicals and Television / Radio.

name: O3Spaces
overview: O3Spaces makes O3Spaces Workplace, a Web 2.0 Document Management & Collaboration Solution for OpenOffice.org, StarOffice and MS Office users.

name: Large Animal Games
overview:
Large Animal was founded in January of 2001 by partners Josh Welber and Wade Tinney, both graduates of the MFA program in interactive design at Parsons School of Design in New York City. Since then, Josh and Wade have been lucky enough to build a team of incredibly talented and hard-working artists, programmers, game designers, musicians and producers. This team has made games of all types; puzzle games, celebrity name games, role-playing games, action games and word games.

Their original, downloadable games for the PC can be found at most major internet portals and demo versions are free to download at largeanimal.com.

name: BuzzBuilder Pro
overview: BuzzBuilder is a web-based lead generation tool that manages targeted email marketing campaigns and generates B2B sales leads.

name: Coleman Research Group
overview:
In 2003, Kevin Coleman founded Coleman Research to give investors a better way to access industry knowledge. Coleman helps thousands of clients get answers to their most critical questions, without leaving their desks. Rather than spending hours reading research reports, or traveling to meet people at conferences, we connect clients directly with industry experts, to hear immediate, relevant insights.

Coleman now serves more than 5,000 individuals at hundreds of global investment firms, consultancies and corporations. We’ve built a network that spans all industries and geographies, with experts in more than 12,000 cities worldwide. Even as we continue to grow, the relationships we’ve built – with our clients and our experts – remain at the heart of our business. Every interaction we have is based on trust and transparency.

In today’s market, information is more available than ever before. But the need for specialized and authentic information, the kind of information that leads to knowledge, continues to be elusive. That’s why there will always be a need for primary research – and for Coleman.

name: Microsupply
overview:
Microsupply is an online e-commerce company offering more than 25,000 computer hardware and software, consumer electronics and communications products in stock at competitive prices and ready to ship same day.

Whether you are a do-it-yourselfer, hard-core gamer, student, stay-at-home parent, small to medium-sized business, IT professional, reseller or anyone desiring a comprehensive digital lifestyle, you’ll enjoy shopping with us.

name: Camstreams
overview: Camstreams is situated in Sheffield, England and has been involved in webcam technology and websites since 1998. Camstreams has a portfolio of web properties involved in locating thousands of public webcams and own some rather good domain names too!

name: Propellum
overview:
Propellum (a divison of Zycus ) is a company that provides job wrapping services to job boards around the world.

Propellum also aggregates data from other domains such as real estate , auto, pets and online shopping catalogues .

Propellum uses AI based auto job-classification software, enabling jobs to be classified automatically and accurately in over 500 categories. This classification code “meta-data” in turn enables powerful search.

Not just from job boards

Propellum is powered by one of the world’s most advanced spidering technology that fetches job content from source (enterprise portals). The setup is done instantly, and we guarantee near 100% coverage.

Not just lower total cost

Propellum guarantees the worlds fastest turn-around time in aggregating job content from source to classification and enrichment, ending with rapid verticalized syndication all at an extremely competitive total cost.

name: echomusic
overview: Digital strategy, branding and marketing

name: Buzzr
overview:
Buzzr, (formerly Codename Enterprises) is creating an open social publishing platform allowing ordinary people, companies and organizations to build websites. The company is led by Ed Sussman, former President of Mansueto Digital, and is a partnership between Lullabot and Bond Art + Science.

The platform will provide a simple way for average users to create dynamic, feature rich websites that previously required extensive work by developers. The product will offer a drag-and-drop interface along with design tools. The product leverages the popular open source Drupal framework. Users will be able to choose between functionality such as wikis, media sharing, social networking and social publishing. A professional services division will assist clients with design, copywriting, SEO, SEM and community moderation.

Lullabot is a Drupal consulting & education company, with clients such as SonyBMG, Lifetime Television, IBM, and Harvard University. They publish DVDs and books, offer private and public Drupal training, and have written several best-selling Drupal books.

Bond Art + Science is an award-winning design and usability company founded by four former Razorfish partners. Clientsinclude Microsoft, Nike, and Atlantic Media. Karen McGrane, who designed NYTimes.com, is leading UI and UX for the company.

The Buzzr team worked together to launch the award-winning FastCompany.com site.

The new platform will be launched in spring of 2009.

name: Opt-Intelligence
overview:
Opt-Intelligence, Inc. operates a cost-per-lead and opt-in ad network that provides solutions for advertisers and publishers in the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, and Australia. Its solutions include co-registration, post-registration, full-page banners, and video overlay. The company’s advertisement solutions also include LeadServe, a service that enables publishers and advertisers to target opt-in offers on their Web site, as well as select specific types of lead generation; and LeadServe that allows advertisers to make and execute real-time decisions about their initiatives. It serves business and finance, health, life style, entertainment, and market research clients.

The company was founded in 2003 and is based in New York, New York.

name: AdPassage
overview:
AdPassage helps companies deeply classify their video assets, with a focus on the “aboutness” of the content.

The company leverages a 5,000 node subject matter taxonomy as well as various facets for people, organizations, places and products among others, to do this.
AdPassage is concentrating on three uses for their taxonomy:

  1. as a foundation for ad targeting (contextual, interest-based & behavioral)
  2. for content syndication services (both for packaging content to syndicate out to partners AND for mapping classifications between syndication partners)
  3. channel/playlist generation & management in support of web site organization and navigation, as well as SEO

name: Thinkingvoice
overview:
thinkingVOICE has been in the lead verification & lead generation space for over 3 years. In the last year tVOICE has tracked, processed and sold over 350,000 hot transfers in the Higher Education space alone.

The thinkingVOICE Platform is also in use by dozens of high volume call centers that have licensed the platform to manage their own campaigns. The thinkingVOICE Platform provides compliance, best practices, transparency and sophisticated analytic’s which help to increase call center performance.

The thinkingVOICE platform has even been licensed by several of the webs top lead generation firms.

DC Cullinane, founder and CEO, has been involved in the online advertising and lead generation industry for over 18 years. As a founder of Impulse Buy Network in 1997 he pioneered online performance based marketing. DC developed many CPA (cost per acquisition) business models including what is now broadly known as Pay Per Click Marketing when he closed the industries first pay per click campaign in 1998. Impulse Buy Network was sold to Inktomi in April of 1999.

name: MEDIAmobz
overview: MEDIAmobz platform enables brands to increase their capacity for compelling video centric digital content creation. Our cloud based platform provides access to thousands of videographers, animators, script writers, digital content creators and others that form a Mobz to create video centric digital media. The cloud based features streamline the production process to achieve fast and compelling content to distribute in the exploding digital channels.

name: DataJoe
overview: DataJoe, LLC develops technology products for business and trade journals, including research tools, e-commerce applications and data-to-print utilities. The company is based in Lakewood, Colorado and majority-owned by The Northern Colorado Business Report in Fort Collins, Colorado.

name: MediaBrains
overview:
MediaBrains Inc. provides business-to-business online advertising solutions. It specializes in industry directories and contextual advertising. The company provides various online advertising options, such as featured listing, banner advertisement, plus listing, company profile page, and newsletter and blog sponsorship. It manages business directories covering various markets, such as automotive, construction, electronic engineering, environmental/utilities, facilities management, financial/insurance, government/public safety, health and beauty, interior design, management, manufacturing, media/entertainment, medical, plastics, retail/consumer, security, telecommunications, textile, transportation, and travel.

MediaBrains Inc. was formerly known as InfoXpress.com and changed its name to MediaBrains Inc. in March 2000. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Naples, Florida.

name: mBLAST
overview:
mPACT is a next-generation, web presence analytics solution that uses advanced semantic, sentiment and natural language processing algorithms to help you discover, analyze and engage with the people that matter most to your business - in near real time.

Think of mPACT as “Google Page Rank for people.” Our patented mPACT dISTIL™ algorithms filter through more than 5 billion articles, blogs, and social media content each month to create a stack-ranked list of the people speakingacross the entire web about your company, your products - or any other topic that’s important to you. But even after you’ve found the right people - you still need to rank them by their importance relative to your organization’s goals:

  • Marketing needs to know which people have the most potential to amplify their messages.
  • Customer service needs to know which people complaining online are most likely to create a meme that goes viral.
  • Human resources needs to know which job candidates are the best cultural fit.

mPACT measures each person’s potential impact through a weighted calculation of five key factors: sentiment, topic, authority, reach and resonance.

For more information, visit www.mblast.com or contact us at info@mblast.com

name: Virtual Strategy Magazine
overview: Virtual-Strategy Magazine (VSM), your leading source for virtualization news, is an online, reader-contributed, publication devoted entirely to the ever changing and rapidly growing virtualization information technology (IT) marketplace. VSM began in 2003 as a simple blog style website keeping up with the relevant news and information in the emerging virtualization arena. From those humble beginnings VSM has grown to a full fledged publication with regular newsletters, daily content updates, attendance at expo’s and tradeshow’s, user group summits and more. VSM is followed by both C-Level Executives and IT Administrators.

name: Freebo
overview:
Freebo is a free, easy-to-use auto website that specializes in local for-sale-by-owner automotive listings.

Managed by the automotive experts at Cars.com, Freebo.com features photos, pricing information, a seller and buyer guide, and unbiased reviews that help both buyers and sellers. With Freebo’s built-in anti-fraud safeguards and updates on the latest online scams, consumers can buy or sell a used car with confidence in a safe, well-monitored environment.

Freebo.com is a member of the Cars.com™ family of sites. Other Cars.com properties include MotherProof.com™, NewCars.com and PickupTrucks.com™. Cars.com is a division of Classified Ventures, LLC™.

name: Toosie
overview: Business Directory which shows you a detail overview about each website. Classifieds can be submitted for free, no matter if commercial or privat.

name: Cloudera
overview:
Cloudera, the commercial Hadoop company, develops and distributes Hadoop, the open source software that powers the data processing engines of the world’s largest and most popular web sites.

Founded by leading experts on big data from Facebook, Google, Oracle and Yahoo, Cloudera’s mission is to bring the power of Hadoop, MapReduce, and distributed storage to companies of all sizes in the enterprise, Internet and government sectors.

Headquartered in Silicon Valley, Cloudera has financial backing from Accel Partners, Greylock Partners and angel investors who include Diane Greene (former CEO of VMware), Marten Mickos (former CEO of MySQL), and Jeff Weiner (CEO of LinkedIn). Cloudera’s advisors include the founders of the Hadoop project, Doug Cutting and Mike Cafarella.

name: Vuclip
overview: With Vuclip, you can access any video on the Internet and watch it on any video-enabled phone. Our state-of-the-art technology optimizes videos and delivers them to your mobile device in real-time. No download or applications are required. And best of all—it’s free. We also give online publishers and content owners the opportunity to mobilize their video content through our API Program. Through a simple API level integration, publishers can quickly and easily bring their video content to millions of mobile consumers. Vuclip’s services are developed with the mobile user in mind—ease of use and a quality video viewing experience remain our driving focus.

name: Paralegal Services USA
overview:
Paralegal Services USA is the nation’s first franchise for freelance paralegals working under the supervision of attorneys.

Our franchise trains you how to set up your business, how to plan, how to market and in the long run, save you time and money. We are there for your support during the term of the franchise. You are going into business for yourself, but not by yourself! Paralegal Services USA will teach paralegals who want to freelance how to become business owners and create a business which you can grow as a valuable financial asset.

name: Favy
overview: Website and toolbar that matches individuals with content using smart mathematics.

name: Engineering Ideas
overview: Engineering Ideas is a private limited company serving the technology and intellectual capital needs of small to medium size business clients in Africa. Founded in 2008, the company aims to take a leadership role in the development of small to medium African businesses through the use of innovative web, mobile and desktop applications. Our founding philosophy revolves around building successful businesses, boosting their growth potential through the active use of innovation, intellectual assets and technology.

name: Replicon
overview:
Replicon, Inc. is the market leader in Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) based time and expense management software. Replicon’s products allow you to track project time and expenses, client billing, employee work schedules, and employee time and attendance.

Founded in 1996, Replicon, Inc. powers companies of all sizes to maximize profitability and productivity and has more than 1.2 million users in 60 countries worldwide. Replicon’s clients include Ernst & Young, Cornell University, Health Canada, Shell, Verizon, Ferrari and Amazon.

Replicon’s product suite includes Web TimeSheet: Project & Billing Edition, Web TimeSheet: Time & Attendance Edition, Web Expense, Web Schedule and Web Resource. All of Replicon’s products are delivered using the SaaS (Software-as-a-Service) model, facilitating instant deployment with no upfront fees or overhead/infrastructure costs. Replicon’s products can be used as standalone solutions or together as a seamlessly integrated product suite.

Web TimeSheet Project & Billing allows users to track project time & costs, with an easy-to-use timesheet interface and real-time reports. Managers can monitor project/task progress, actual vs. estimated hours/cost, and billing amounts while ensuring accuracy through multi-level approvals and integration with both your project management and accounting software.
